channel.title: yudel tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from yudel.

item.description: @AD_Lobel Prescribe lemonade!
item.source:markdown: @AD_Lobel Prescribe lemonade!

item.description: A Klingon might speculate that only @dick_nixon could stop the Speaker from going to Taiwan. But would he if asked? https://t.co/jbedSnlwHr
item.source:markdown: A Klingon might speculate that only @dick_nixon could stop the Speaker from going to Taiwan. But would he if asked? https://t.co/jbedSnlwHr

item.description: @BadSocialism @sexysurak Sounds like people want a new show to feel like a TOS or TNG rerun. It’s an odd complaint because it was pretty clear pretty soon that the SNW thought longer and harder about the new and the legacy characters than Roddenberry ever did.
item.source:markdown: @BadSocialism @sexysurak Sounds like people want a new show to feel like a TOS or TNG rerun. It’s an odd complaint because it was pretty clear pretty soon that the SNW thought longer and harder about the new and the legacy characters than Roddenberry ever did.

item.description: @Atrios Might be fun to dig through old @jdforward archives and see whose byline was on their breathless coverage of the matter.
item.source:markdown: @Atrios Might be fun to dig through old @jdforward archives and see whose byline was on their breathless coverage of the matter.

item.description: @AkivaMCohen If you can’t trust a friend of JP, who can you trust?
item.source:markdown: @AkivaMCohen If you can’t trust a friend of JP, who can you trust?

item.description: @rafaelshimunov @JFREJNYC I’m not yet willing to consign my 1990s NYC glory years to the dustbin of history.
item.source:markdown: @rafaelshimunov @JFREJNYC I’m not yet willing to consign my 1990s NYC glory years to the dustbin of history.

item.description: @rafaelshimunov @JFREJNYC No disrespect to jfrej, but I’m not sure Abraham Kahan would agree with this perspective on the historical roots of New York’s left wing Jewish community.
item.source:markdown: @rafaelshimunov @JFREJNYC No disrespect to jfrej, but I’m not sure Abraham Kahan would agree with this perspective on the historical roots of New York’s left wing Jewish community.

item.description:
@RokhlK Or just read Ben Hecht.

@RokhlK And learn to write the one sentence paragraph.

@RokhlK Until your editor cries for fewer carriage returns.
@quamona_rimby @Namer98 So it’s not about the kids who were roped into abandoning high-paying newsboy gigs to sharpen Salo Baron’s pencils as his research assistants?
item.source:markdown: @quamona_rimby @Namer98 So it’s not about the kids who were roped into abandoning high-paying newsboy gigs to sharpen Salo Baron’s pencils as his research assistants?

item.description: @MisfitTorah I think if you’re throwing them at your interior walls, and said walls are standard wood or wallboard or something plaster, nobody is going to get terribly hurt.
item.source:markdown: @MisfitTorah I think if you’re throwing them at your interior walls, and said walls are standard wood or wallboard or something plaster, nobody is going to get terribly hurt.

item.description: @SamuelSpinner Does Dr. Stampfer give population estimates of how big this rabbinically literate elite was at different times and places?
item.source:markdown: @SamuelSpinner Does Dr. Stampfer give population estimates of how big this rabbinically literate elite was at different times and places?

item.description: Anyone knowledgeable about the nuances of Orthodox abortion psak able to weigh in on this machlokes between the Department of Justice and the State of Idaho regarding protecting a pregnant person’s health? https://t.co/yZWAuTQ0mr

item.description: This could have funded G-dcast for over a decade. Ah well, at least our evangelical Zionist brothers have the money to make Passover videos, even if they’re a bit more Jesus-focused than old-school Jews might like. https://t.co/X8giS55P1w

item.description:

item.description:
No, I do not want to be reading news about one of the Jewish communities @jewishstandard covers in my tech/science feed, thank you very much.

item.description: @jothar @mikefox26 A shame. It seems like the the Moetzes certainly could use a doctor on board. He would have set a useful precedent. https://t.co/p3QSohP3T9

item.description: @MotownRabbi @DBashIdeas @HeliasHebreus He was frum. He had just suffered through too many years of yeshiva students who could handle lomdus but not history.
